title: List of all Android ai  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android ai  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: aircon
repoList.description: Remote config management Android library powered by annotation processing and code generation.

repoList.name: FlashAirDev
repoList.description: Android library for FlashAir

repoList.name: Airports-App
repoList.description: Simple Android app using popular 3rd party libraries to call a webservice, parse the JSON results, and persist in a database

repoList.name: android-aws-architecture-components-dialogflow-chatbot
repoList.description: Android chatbot using: Dialogflow (Api.ai) for machine learning & NLP, AWS DynamoDB NoSQL Database, DynamoDB Object Mapper, AWS Cognito Identity. Android Architecture Components: Room Persistence Library, ViewModel, Live Data. MVVM Architecture Pattern

repoList.name: airspy_android
repoList.description: A ported version of the libairspy library to use with Android 3.1+

repoList.name: GC-Airhorn
repoList.description: Android library for playing Airhorn sound when GC happens

repoList.name: ReactiveAirplaneMode
repoList.description: ✈️ Android library listening airplane mode with RxJava Observables

repoList.name: AirBrush
repoList.description: AirBrush is an Android library for simplifying the creation/handling of placeholder images that are shown while images are loading.

repoList.name: Siri-Clone-for-Android
repoList.description: This Android app is basically a personal assistant for you the same way Siri is on the iPhone. I used the speech to text library from api.ai for the speech recognition necessary for this app. I made this app as a personal challenge to finish a project in 1 week over spring break.

repoList.name: SMARTBOT
repoList.description: An open source AI chatbot and virtual assistant for Android Made using Program-ab java library from google and alicebot
